servinfo.title: Excessive engine oil consumption – Oil entering combustion chamber
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the following when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:J24B and Engine Basic Inspection:J24B .

condition.ptxt: Excessive engine oil consumption – Oil entering combustion chamber

ps.ptxt: Worn piston ring groove and ring

ps.ptxt: Improper location of piston ring gap
